sentence.Network_en: The manifesto is long-winded, repetitious and often ambiguous or poorly drafted.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份声明冗长繁复，多处存在歧义或行文拙劣。

sentence.Network_en: The manifesto gives pride of place to job creation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项宣言将创造工作机会放在首位。

sentence.Network_en: The Tories are currently drawing up their election manifesto.
sentence.Network_cn: 保守党人目前正在起草竞选宣言。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Italian, from manifestare, from Latin, 'make public', from manifestus 'obvious' (see manifest)

entry.tran: （尤指政党或政府的）宣言，声明
entry.def: A manifesto is a statement published by a person or group of people, especially a political party, or a government, in which they say what their aims and policies are.

example.ex: The Tories are currently drawing up their election manifesto...
example.tran: 保守党人目前正在起草竞选宣言。

example.ex: His manifesto promised measures to protect them.
example.tran: 他在宣言里保证要为他们采取保护措施。

means.word_mean: 1. a public declaration of intentions (as issued by a political party or government)

auth_sentence.content: She knew what...the party manifesto committed her to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content: She knew what...the party manifesto committed her to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She knew what...the party manifesto committed her to achieve.

auth_sentence.content: Drumont's book was above all an anti-immigrant manifesto.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drumont's book was above all an anti-immigrant manifesto.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drumont's book was above all an anti-immigrant manifesto.

auth_sentence.content: Nearly a million have signed a manifesto demanding he quits.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nearly a million have signed a manifesto demanding he quits.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"音乐术语"; 2. 表名词,"人,物或状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
bass低音+o音乐术语→n.低音部,低音歌手
concert音乐会+o音乐术语→n.协奏曲
cre增长+escend开始+o音乐术语→n.[音乐]声音渐强
di使+minu=min小+end+o音乐术语→n.[音乐]渐弱
orat说+ori+o音乐术语→n.清唱剧
pian轻柔+o音乐术语→n.钢琴
sopran高音,高声+o音乐术语→n.女高音,最高者
tang+o音乐术语→来自黑人的舞
brave勇敢的+o人,物或状态→bravo亡命徒
dynam力量+o表名词→n.发电机
fiasc+o人,物或状态→意大利词,愿意为易碎的瓶子
fresc=fresh新鲜的+o人,物或状态→指画在墙上的画鲜艳
gust趣味+o人,物或状态→n.爱好,兴致勃勃

stems_affixes.value_cn: [剧院或乐团等]经理人,主办者
stems_affixes.word_buile: impresari=impresar+o人,物或状态→n.[剧院或乐团等]经理人,主办者
maestr=master大师+o人,物或状态→n.音乐大师
magnific庄严的,崇高的+o人,物或状态→n.贵族,高官,显要人物
manifest显然的,明白的+o人,物或状态→n.宣言,声明
mot动+o人,物或状态→motto→行动指南→座右铭,箴言
pati=pat+o人,物或状态→n.庭院,平台
relieve浮现+o人,物或状态→relievo浮雕
tyr+o人,物或状态→来自拉丁文tiro,新手
volcan来自罗马神话中的火神Vulcan+o人,物或状态→n.火山

sentences.en: I was involved in the preparation of Labour’s manifesto.
sentences.cn: 我参与了工党宣言的起草工作。
